SPEAKER: SPEAKER_00
Text: First of all, I would like to thank the Lord our God for all his blessings. I would also like to thank my family and friends who are here for the love and support.

Text: I would also like to thank my father up in heaven for watching down on me, and I would like to thank my entire defense team.

Text: I'd also like to thank the jury for their considering my case. And I would also like to thank you, your honor, for presiding over this hearing, I mean for this case.

SPEAKER: SPEAKER_00
Text: Now I would like to apologize to the victims of my crimes and all the people that I hurt.

Text: Um, obviously my family, my friends, Tiffany, Atsman, Andrew Hunt on the rose and of course the Lord, our God.

Text: I know that as a result of my actions, I shocked and hurt a lot of people, but
